sections.title: Effortless Project Time Tracking and Invoicing
sections.name: hero
sections.label: Home
sections.content: Welcome to **ProjectTrue**, your comprehensive solution for seamless project time tracking and invoicing. Streamline your project management and billing in one efficient platform.

images.name: MainBanner
images.description: An image depicting project management and invoicing, featuring a laptop and clock.

sections.title: About ProjectTrue
sections.name: about
sections.label: About
sections.content: At **ProjectTrue**, we believe in empowering businesses with easy and reliable time and invoice management. Our software enables you to track project progress, manage budgets, and create invoices effortlessly, giving you more time to focus on what matters most – growing your business. Join us as we pave the way towards better time management and transparency in billing.

images.name: TeamWorkingTogether
images.description: A team of professionals collaborating on a project, symbolizing teamwork and productivity facilitated by ProjectTrue.

sections.title: Our Services
sections.name: services
sections.label: Services
sections.content:
Explore the functionalities that make **ProjectTrue** the best choice for your business:

- **Client Management:** Keep all your client data, from contact information to total billed amounts, organized in one place.
- **Project Tracking:** Monitor hours worked and budget consumption with detailed project reports.
- **Invoice Generation:** Create, manage, and send invoices easily, with the option to include detailed task breakdowns.
- **Task Management:** Allocate resources efficiently, track task progress, and ensure projects stay on track.
- **Timesheets:** Conveniently log hours worked and calculate billing with precision.

images.name: ServiceFeatures
images.description: Visual representation of all the features offered by ProjectTrue.

sections.title: Get in Touch
sections.name: contact
sections.label: Contact
sections.content:
For questions or support, reach out to us and our team will be happy to assist you:

- **Email:** support@projecttrue.com  
- **Phone:** +1 (800) 123-4567  
- **Address:** 123 Project Lane, Suite 400, Business City, BC 12345  

Alternatively, use the contact form to send us a message directly from here.
